problem_text_cn: 如图,Rt△ABC中,∠ABC=90°,AB=BC=2,以BC为直径的圆交AC于点D,则图中阴影部分的面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠ABC = N_0, AB = BC = N_1, the circle with BC as the diameter intersects AC at point D, then the area of ​​the shaded part in the figure is ()
raw_answer: 解:AB=BC,∴∠C=45°,∴DC=BD,∴由BD,CD组成的两个弓形面积相等,所以阴影部分的面积就等于△ABD的面积,所以S△ABD=2×1÷2=1．故选:C．
